https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zGRJwh5oJVsEcgKn6BNwgzhuOIM.jpg A bloody conflict erupts between ranchers and store owners in Lincoln County. Billy the Kid, the most iconic outlaw of the Old West, has become a skillful gunslinger with one glaring weakness: his own arrogance. Billy is repeatedly confronted with his own mortality and shortcomings as he approaches a showdown in Lincoln County, which would become one of historyâ€™s most famous Wild West gunfights Billy the Kid: Showdown in Lincoln County
